summary:
This code calls "copt_cmd" to read an MPS file named "converted.mps" and perform various operations: 
1) "feasrelax" operation for feasibility analysis, 
2) "optimize" operation for solving the optimization problem, 
3) optional extra "optimize" and "exit" commands to finish the process.

details.comment:
